title: Senior Frontend Engineer – Google Fiber (XWF)
descriptions: Developed the customer-facing web portal and support page using **Next.js**, improving performance and user experience.
Maintained and enhanced legacy systems built with **AngularJS**, ensuring feature parity and a smooth transition path.
Collaborated cross-functionally with designers, backend engineers, and product teams to deliver accessible, responsive, and scalable web applications.

title: Senior Full Stack Developer – Standard Chartered Bank
descriptions: Developed and maintained internal applications for Relationship Managers (RMs) to assess counterparty default risk and monitor SCB’s overall risk exposure.
Contributed to systems ensuring compliance with **Bank of England** regulations introduced after the subprime crisis to safeguard banks and consumers.
Built responsive, performant UIs using **React**, **Redux**, and **RxJS**.
Designed and integrated backend services using **Spring Boot**.
Collaborated closely with business analysts and risk teams to deliver secure and accurate reporting tools.

title: Frontend Developer – Minitheory Pte Ltd
descriptions: Built responsive, production-grade **React + Redux** web interfaces for clients such as **Giving.sg** and **Aware.org.sg**, aligning closely with high-fidelity UI/UX designs.
Partnered with **IDEO** to deliver interactive web experiences that emphasized storytelling and user engagement.
Created rapid web prototypes to support iterative design processes and client feedback loops.
Collaborated with designers and UX researchers to ensure accurate and consistent implementation of visual and interaction design.
